jobDescription: OverviewWe are committed to provide our Employees a stable work environment with equal opportunity for learning and personal growth. Creativity and innovation are encouraged for improving the effectiveness of Southwest Airlines. May perform other job duties as directed by Employee’s Leaders.QualificationsBASIC QUALIFICATIONS: High School Diploma, GED or equivalent education required. Must be at least 18 years of age. Able to mentor others to do the same.Able to develop, present and effectively communicate ideas and strategies to a variety of audiences.Able to teach and mentor others concerning technical and business subjects. Must maintain a well-groomed appearance per Company appearance standards as described in established guidelines. Southwest Airlines is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
